resources.string: Started my professional journey at the age of 17 and have been funding my education since then. Currently working a Strategy advisory consultant in the Management Consulting arm of IBM Global Business Services (GBS).

Corefield Technologies Pvt Ltd has been setup with the main aim of providing IT solutions for Businesses dealing with ‘Field work Force’. The available solutions for managing the operations part of such businesses leaves a big white space.
FieldWebis a complete operations lifecycle management solution for Businesses dealing with ‘Field work Force’.
We serve you to optimize your IT Costs from general IT Operations to IT as a strategic proponent for your business.
This service enables you to have a virtual time shared CIO, as a service.
